text:
[Verse]
Stars in the night sky bright they glow
Twinkling above us down below
Wish on a star hope it comes true
Dreams in the stardust just for you

[Verse 2]
Moonlight dancing shadows on the ground
Nighttime whispers magic all around
Feel the breeze gentle on your face
Lost in the cosmic endless space

[Chorus]
Stars in the night a million lights
Guiding us through these sleepless nights
In the sky so high they shine
Stars in the night forever mine

[Verse 3]
Constellations patterns in the sky
Stories told as time goes by
Galaxies spinning tales untold
In the dark the wonders unfold

[Bridge]
When you’re lost look up and see
The stars they glimmer just for thee
In the night they light the way
Through the dark until the day

[Chorus]
Stars in the night a million lights
Guiding us through these sleepless nights
In the sky so high they shine
Stars in the night forever mine
title: Stars in the Night
